name: dotvault
description: Encrypt and decrypt .vault inside a .env file
author: Adrien Graux <adrien.graux@gmail.com>

scripts.version:patch: yarn preversion && yarn version patch && yarn postversion
scripts.version:minor: yarn preversion && yarn version minor && yarn postversion
scripts.version:major: yarn preversion && yarn version major && yarn postversion
scripts.postversion: yarn git:version && yarn npm publish && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.git:version: yarn git:commitversion && yarn git:tagversion && git push --tag && git push
scripts.git:commitversion: git add .yarn package.json && git commit -m v$npm_package_version
